original_title: Train service on Kelani Valley line disrupted
original_body_lines: All train services on the Kelani Valley (KV) Railway Line have been cancelled due to a derailment, the Railways Department said.
They said a train was derailed at the Serpentine Road level crossing between Baseline and Cotta Road railway station.
The train that left Colombo Fort at 4 p.m. to Kosgama was derailed.
Two compartments of the train were derailed. However, train service will operate according to the usual schedule tomorrow. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
